unnormalised: IAF Wing Commander Rakesh Sharma (retd.) will be the chief guest at the Defence Expo this year. Sharma Sir, the first Indian in space, still inspires tons of youngsters to join the armed forces!
normalised: I-A-F Wing Commander Rakesh Sharma (retired) will be the chief guest at the Defence Expo this year. Sharma Sir, the first Indian in space, still inspires tons of youngsters to join the armed forces!

unnormalised: The Defence Minister, Rajnath Singh, also confirmed that Maj. Gen. Iyer will be leading the innovation showcase. Apparently, the Maj. Gen. has some really cool startups lined up for display.
normalised: The Defence Minister, Rajnath Singh, also confirmed that Major General Iyer will be leading the innovation showcase. Apparently, the Major General has some really cool startups lined up for display.

unnormalised: Heard that Capt. Verma from the Navy is also planning a surprise demo with the latest submarine tech. This Defence Expo is gonna be lit! Wonder if they'll finally promote Lt. Bajaj to Commander. Been hearing that rumour for ages!
normalised: Heard that Captain Verma from the Navy is also planning a surprise demo with the latest submarine tech. This Defence Expo is going to be lit! Wonder if they will finally promote Lieutenant Bajaj to Commander. Been hearing that rumour for ages!
